text: <@U0YNFB22X> In my case, transaction to CC2 is failing, but whole transaction (transaction to CC1) is successful. Ideally, if transaction to CC2 is failing, then transaction to CC1 should also fail because part of the transaction (transaction to CC2) is failing.
Exception thrown by CC2 is catching by System Chaincode (shim) but it is not informing CC1 about the failure of transaction to CC2.
